com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement
Class Alias

java.lang.Object
  com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Alias

public class Alias
extends java.lang.Object

This class used to producing an ALIAS clause which temporary renaming the object(could be table||column||function) as a given name in a particular SQL statement.

For example:

new Alias("tbl_name", "tmp_name") would produce "tbl_name AS tmp_name".

new Alias(Function.sum("price"), "total_price") would produce "sum(price) AS total_price".

Note: Statement would calls the toString() method to take the final clause.

          Constructing the ALIAS clause.

Alias

             java.lang.CharSequence alias)
Constructing the ALIAS clause.

Parameters:
object - the object to be renaming for. Usually a table name or column name, can be either a normal String which just the name or wrapped the name's Function object.
alias - the newly name.
